title: COVID-19 Inquiry Team - EO Support Officer x2

content.text:
• Candidate will have strong communication and influencing skills, a good ability to develop and maintain positive working relationships and the ability to make sense of, translate and apply technically and legally sophisticated information.
• Excellent organisational skills and the resilience to work in and adapt to a fast-paced environment are essential to this role.
• Working at pace, handle contending priorities and deliver high standards of quality in every work area is a key aspect of the role.
Please click here for the full job description
